imdb.title: Kyôshirô to towa no sora
imdb.plot: Shattered Angels revolves around the life of Kuu Shiratori, a seemingly normal highschool girl who enjoys her school life in the giant city Academica and dreams of finding an handsome prince.

episodes.title: Towa no sora
episodes.plot: Ku is a young girl who always dreamed with a special prince. She never knew that one day she would meet him. "My prince..", she recalls on her mind while watching him, not knowing that she would fall in love with him and that her life will never be the same after meeting him and the absolute angels.

episodes.title: Mikazuki byakuya
episodes.plot: Kuu is only just beginning to reflect on the chaos that unfolded at school when she is abducted by an unfamiliar girl who knows important information about the Absolute Angels.

episodes.title: Mai odoru rasen
episodes.plot: Kuu tries very hard to truly understand Setsuna, even as battle plans are put in place to deal with the looming threat of Batraz. Meanwhile, Kyoshiro offers Kuu a chance to see his former academy.

episodes.title: Koibotaru
episodes.plot: Though there is little she can do to help, Kuu does her best to tend to wounded Kyoshiro. Her efforts are rewarded when Kyoshiro shares an important story from his past.

episodes.title: Kuchizuke senrei
episodes.plot: Shocking revelations spell out Kuu's fate after she finds her relaxing shopping trip with Kyoshiro interrupted by a kidnapping attempt!

episodes.title: Yume hate jûjiro
episodes.plot: Kuu discovers the truth of her role in the world of the Absolute Angels and accepts the consequences of uniting with Kaon. But before action can be taken, a battle erupts.

episodes.title: Samayoi no aika
episodes.plot: Safe for now and pondering the direction of her life as an Absolute Angel, Kuu takes steps to release the powers within her. Meanwhile, Kyoshiro's feelings for the girl lead to a conflicted heart.

episodes.title: Otome mi hatenu
episodes.plot: Kazuya's presence could spell disaster. After reappearing, he takes harsh action against anyone who dares stand in his way of claiming the power of the Absolute Angels.

episodes.title: Tenshi no basutîyu
episodes.plot: After Tarlotte is captured, Kazuya moves forward with his plan. All five Absolute Angels are his - and the Bastille could soon be unleashed. Kyoshiro must act quickly to rescue Kuu and the others.

episodes.title: Tenshi kairo
episodes.plot: Kazuya's goal is at hand! With Bastille reborn, the situation looks bleak - unless the Absolute Angels can once more take control of their own fates.

episodes.title: Eien no sora
episodes.plot: Kazuya is defeated but victory did not come without loss for the Absolute Angels. Kyoshiro must say goodbye to Kuu -if only for now.
